HARD CODED DUTCH SUBTITLES - NO WAY TO REMOVE THEM.  Better to download a Sony screener for now and wait for the official DVD to come out if you want a DVDR rip.

Oh yeah - really awesome movie!

Gotta love how people claim shit is a DVD rip when its still in theaters... Even if you were to get an  early leak wouldnt be as shit quality as 99% of them are on here. Great movie but ppl really need to learn to fuckin label shit properly bc this isnt a DVD rip.. fuckin dumb apes
